from typing import List

class Solution:
    def getMaxFunctionValue(self, receiver: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(receiver)
        max_value = 0
        for start_player in range(n):
            visited = [False] * n
            sum_ids = start_player
            current_player = start_player
            passes = 0
            while passes < k:
                if visited[current_player]:
                    break
                visited[current_player] = True
                current_player = receiver[current_player]
                sum_ids += current_player
                passes += 1
            additional_passes = k - passes
            if additional_passes > 0 and current_player == start_player:
                cycle_length = passes
                complete_cycles = additional_passes // cycle_length
                remainder_passes = additional_passes % cycle_length
                cycle_sum = sum_ids - start_player
                sum_ids += complete_cycles * cycle_sum
                current_player = start_player
                for _ in range(remainder_passes):
                    current_player = receiver[current_player]
                    sum_ids += current_player
            max_value = max(max_value, sum_ids)
        return max_value
